text: Romualdo Coviello (8 May 1940 – 21 January 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democracy party, the Italian People's Party, and Democracy is Freedom – The Daisy. He was in the Senate of the Republic from 1987 to 2006. He was born in Avigliano, Italy. Coviello died in Rome, Italy on 21 January 2022, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Basilicata
title: Romualdo Coviello
